title: TV Tropes' guidelines and terms are easy to read

tosdr.case: The terms for this service are easy to read
tosdr.tldr: TV Tropes provides a full, comprehensive look into it's own guidelines and workings through it's "Administrivia" page. All the rules and customs are written in simple English, allowing users to have an easier time understanding how things work on the service, though their terminology may seem a little vague. Whether this trait can be translated over into other languages is yet to be determined.
